subject: Self Care
title: Compassion for Others Starts With You
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Compassion for Others Starts With You.

hook.text: Flight attendants say put your own mask on first. Compassion works the same way. Empty givers burn out.

buildup.text: Research shows self-compassion increases compassion toward others. You can't pour from an empty cup indefinitely.

discovery.text: People who are harshest with themselves are often harshest with others. Inner criticism leaks outward.

twist.text: Being kind to yourself isn't selfish. It's the prerequisite for being genuinely kind to everyone around you.

climax.text: Start your compassion practice inward. Once the well is full, it overflows naturally to those around you.

punchline.text: Fill your own cup first. Then let it overflow to others.

quiz.question: How does self-compassion affect compassion for others?
options: Self-compassion increases your capacity to be compassionate to others
There is no connection between the two
